parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set entity [[Eden Editor: Entity Attributes|attributes]].
<br><br>
An attribute is identified by its <tt>property</tt> (<tt>data</tt> when it is engine-drive attribute) value in config. For the list of all attributes with their properties, see [[Eden_Editor:_Setting_Attributes#Attributes|Setting Attributes]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Attributes are available only within the Eden Editor workspace. You cannot access them in scenario preview or exported scenario!</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''set3DENAttributes''' [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[<entities1>,<class1>,<value1>], ..., [<entitiesN>,<classN>,<valueN>]]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> entities: [[Array]] of types [[Eden Entity]] or [[Eden ID]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - attribute name
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> value: [[Anything]] - new attribute value
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if the value was set

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[set3DENAttributes]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[get3DENSelected]] "Object","ControlMP",[[true]] ]];</code>
Set all selected objects as playable

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> 
[[get3DENAttribute]] [[clear3DENAttribute]]
</value></part></template>
